column4: I think I'm going to have to screw Linux for my needs... I'll see you all later :)
I'll keep you all in VMWare :)
I've been looking and looking, but not finding any way to solve my issues
Linux is way better than windows
Wireless at DSU and using two monitors
I think I'll use Windows and play Winth Ubuntu in VMWare until I get the stuff working, then use my backup
i have a FULL backup of where I am now
lol, ya linux hardware compatiblity is a little behind...
I use windows only for games, the rest is all linux.
I love Linux, it's very highly productive, when it works.
it's not working, i need to figure out how to make it work, but I need something working until I get there.
